sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary mx-2" @click="editDetail(subId)">
    แก้ไขข้อมูล
  </button>
  
  <button class="btn btn-sm btn-danger mx-2" @click="delDetail(subId)">
    ลบข้อมูล
  </button>
</template>

<script>

import SubjEdit from './SubjEdit.vue';
export default {
  name: "SubjDel",
  props: ["subId"],
  
  data() {
    return {};
  },
  methods: {
    editDetail(theID) {
      this.$emit("edit", theID);
    },
    delDetail(theID) {
      fetch("http://localhost:3000/course/" +theID, {
        method: "DELETE",
      })
        .then(this.$emit("delete"))
        .catch();
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style>
</style>
